name: Coma (B_Chayson)
description:
You wake up in an unknown place. 

You don’t know where you are.

 All you know is you have this feeling that you have to get out of here. 

Now.

WARNING: Flashing lights warning

Coma is a first-person horror maze game, where you venture through different mazes in an attempt to escape the dreary halls, as their haunting inhabitants stalk your path. You are never alone.

Developers: Pedro Zarranz Loures and Graeme Ironside

Game Designer: Jai'Dean Airall-Hussey 

Audio Designer: Chris Schmitt

Artists & Level Designers: Alyson Lutes, Benroy Chayson, and Jaedyn Mitchell

Coma was created in 4 days for Centennial College's Fall 2021 Game Jam, with the theme of "Another World". Available for download on Windows, Mac and Linux. (best played when downloaded)
